message.name: ERR_FIN_SCHEDULE_EXISTS
message.locale: The same Month Financial Schedule exist for provided date month. Kindly Cancel Existing Financial Schedule and try again

message.name: ERR_FIN_SCHEDULE_COMPLETED
message.locale: The same Month Financial Schedule is completed. Kindly contact administrator

message.name: ERR_FIN_SCHEDULE_RUNDATE_MUST_INFUTURE
message.locale: The Financial Schedule Run date must be in future
